name: Cavern Crawler
description:
Avoid traps to escape a deep dark cave.

(try slamming into some walls, you might find a secret)

controls:

movement - arrow keys

exit shop/credits - esc

Art by Imad Rahman and Cleo Pavesi.

Music and sound effects by Alex Howe.

Programming by Samuel Leach and Rajinder Ropra.

This game was made in 9 days for the 45th Godot Wild Game Jam

https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-45
